title: Ablution container for Beaumont Primary School
description: Mega job by the staff. School ordered and arranged container and all it's necessary contents. We organized installation and complete cladding as well as deck and covering. You wouldn't know it's a container from the outside. üëèüëèüëèüëè

title: Beaumont Primary School
description: Super proud of the team for doing such an amazing job with such a tight timeline for completion. Works finished professionally and on time. Thank you Beaumont Primary School for entrusting us with the work. Paint supplied by Midas Paints Strand Somerset West. #painting #InternalPainting #Paintsmiths #midaspaints

title: De Zalze Golf Club Restaurant
description: De Zalze Golf Club Restaurant complete and had its first function Friday. Looks great. Well done team and Ressource Decor. #dezalzegolfclub #ressourcedecor
